name: The Holidays 2020
description:
It’s that time of year again! That’s right, the one where it’s the middle of November except everyone is already thinking about the Holiday. So, "Santa" is forced to deliver his presents earlier than ever before. But because he’s doing it so much earlier, all the other holiday icons are pissed, and they’re out for blood. It’s your job to ensure that every child in every continent on the planet gets their presents. I know what you’re thinking. Yes, "Santa" is even going to Antarctica this year. It’s time for you to put on your Santa hat, grab those presents, eat every cookie, and shove the holiday spirit right down everyone’s chimneys.

Credits: November Jammers

Ryan Bahmanyar
Davis Canby 
Penny Lewis 
Ethan Bowen 
Jessica Bailey
